backend/main.mo: Actor manages user profiles, page content, pricing entries, CSR info, and access control with role-based permissions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a Zurich couples landing page text change and its related files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries for key frontend files covering routing, pages, styling, and CSR generation.
frontend/ic-assets.json: Asset configuration allowing inclusion of the .well-known directory.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point with SEO metadata, Plausible script, and root div for React app.
frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains: Domain verification file listing paarweg.com and www.paarweg.com.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap listing all site URLs with their metadata and last modified dates.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, QueryClient, theming, and all site routes including Zurich landing page.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout component providing header navigation, mobile menu, scroll-to-top behavior, and footer.
frontend/src/components/MobileReadMore.t: Collapsible mobile content component controlled by a feature flag with expand/collapse behavior.
frontend/src/config/featureFlags.ts: Defines feature flags, currently enabling or disabling mobile content compacting.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing authenticated or anonymous backend actors with automatic refetching.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, identity loading, and status handling. Wraps AuthClient creation with custom options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks to fetch hardcoded CSR metadata and generate a new CSR using Web Crypto, including ASN.1 PKCS#10 construction.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light and dark theme variables with warm color palettes and basic typography and layout rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it in React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with SEO metadata setup and a styled hero section introducing Roland Soder.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: React page that sets SEO metadata and renders a contact and booking section with email, phone, and scheduling details.
frontend/src/pages/CouplesPage.tsx: Page defining SEO tags and presenting information about couples coaching with a hero section, descriptions, and a booking button.
frontend/src/pages/CSRGeneratorPage.tsx: Implements a CSR generator UI that auto-creates CSRs, checks DNS availability, and supports copying and downloading generated keys.
frontend/src/pages/DomainVerificationPag: Component that fetches and validates a domain verification file and displays success or error status with file details.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage that configures extensive SEO metadata and presents service highlights, coaching info, and structured data.
frontend/src/pages/LegalPage.tsx: Static page displaying the site's legal information, including impressum, contact details, and disclaimers.
frontend/src/pages/MenPage.tsx: React page for men’s coaching with SEO meta tag setup and a hero section using MobileReadMore and CTA buttons.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Pricing page that configures SEO tags and displays service costs, FAQs, and booking options.
frontend/src/pages/SitemapPage.tsx: Generates and displays an XML sitemap with dynamic lastmod dates and a list of public URLs.
frontend/src/pages/TechnicalStatusPage.t: Diagnostics page running frontend-based technical checks like DNS, SSL, redirects, and analytics integration.
frontend/src/pages/WomenPage.tsx: React page for women’s coaching with SEO setup, descriptive hero content, and CTA buttons.
frontend/src/pages/ZurichCouplesLandingP: Landing page for Zurich couples counseling with extensive SEO tags, hero content, and booking links.
frontend/src/types/calendly.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for Calendly-related types.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash routes), storing them in sessionStorage, and clearing them, with precedence for URL values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animation utilities.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including state version, summaries, features, new requests, and project configuration for tracking changes.
